📌 Game Name\t\t\t:\t\t\tCave Saviour
📌 Game Mode\t\t\t:\t\t\tSingle Player
\t\t\t\t\t Cave Saviour is a 2D physics-based game created with simple graphics.

\t\t\t\t\t It is an "Enemy killing" Game, where the core gameplay is based on making weapon to touch the enemy and killing that enemy. Killing an enemy leaves an empty space at its location and player gets plus points or penalty according to which enemy killed.
\t\t\t\t\t The game is split in different levels. Each level poses different challenge to the player,such as achieving minimum score and dealing with different clone of enemies.
\t\t\t\t\t The game is based on reaching the winning(maximum) score in each level, and win-lose strategy is staged accordingly.
🤔\t DEMO VIDEO 👇🏿
🤔\t Who is Cave Man ?

\t\t\t📌 Cave Man is the saviour of the cave. He will be found sitting on tree on PLay Screen and will be able to kill the enemies coming from right side through axe (his weapon), take some bonus points and also some penalty.
🤔\t Who are the Enemies in red ?
\t\t\t📌 Red Enemies are one type of enemies, that are red in color. On killing it player gets 10 extra points
🤔\t Who are the Enemies in black ?
\t\t\t📌 Black Enemies are another type of enemies, that are black in color. On killing it player gets penalty of 10 points
🤔\t What are fire in bunch of enemies ?
\t\t\t📌 When axe touches the fire, it gives penalty of 50 points to player.
🤔\t What are gold star in bunch of enemies ?
\t\t\t📌 When axe touches the gold star, it gives extra score of 50 to player.
🤔\t How to play game ?
\t\t\t📌 The game is simple and above the FAQs there is a demo video showing how to play game.

\t\t\t📌 Firstly, player need to select the game level, and then he/she will be directed to the corresponding level. Now the axe is with CAVE MAN sitting on the tree, and player needs to put finger on top of caveman and swipe towards right.
\t\t\t📌 The player gets the score according to the enemies touched by the axe.
\t\t\t📌 When the bunch of enemy are about to over, the GAME OVER! message will be displayed indicating that level is over.
\t\t\t📌 Then if player wants to play another level, he/she need to touch any where on the GAMEOVER! screen.
\t\t\t📌 If player doesn\'t want to play more, he/she needs to select the back key button.
🤔\t When will the "GAME OVER!" message will be displayed ?

\t\t\t📌 The GAME OVER! message will be displayed on screen when particular level finishes. At this point, If player want to play next level, he/she need to touch anywhere on the screen. Otherwise pressing the back key and player will be directed to the MENU page.
🤔\t What is Level Score ?
\t\t\t📌 The Level Score is visible at the top left corner for each level.
🤔\t What is Winning Score ?
\t\t\t📌 The Winning Score set to 500, is the minimum score player has to score to win that level.
🤔\t What is Status ?

\t\t\t📌 Status describes whether player has won or not, and if not then how much more score needed. If the Level Score is less than Winning Score, Status will be "Need X Points" where X is extra required points to win, Otherwise the Status will be "YOU WON".
🤔\t What is there in Option button of MENU page ?
\t\t\t📌 On clicking on Option button, player gets the chance to rate the game among five stars.
🤔\t What is there in Credits button of MENU page ?
\t\t\t📌 On Clicking on credits button, Player will be able to see the contact information of the developer and also gets a feedback option.
🤔\t What is there in About button of MENU page ?
\t\t\t📌 On clicking on about button, Player will be able to see information(description) about the game.
